column4: I get this message: audiotestsrc wave=sine freq=512 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! gconfaudiosink: The resource is busy or not .
can anyone point me in the right direction for ubuntu audio help?
#ubuntu is a good place to get help with that ;)
thats what I was hoping... I'll have a look at some links and see what I can do.
people are usually helpful in here. crimsun is _the_ sound guru. I don't think he's around right now though
